net.sharemycode.controller

Class ResourceController

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sharemycode.controller.ResourceController

  • @ApplicationScoped
public class ResourceController
extends java.lang.Object
    Performs persistence operations for ProjectResources
    Author:
    Lachlan Archibald

      • listAllResources

        @Deprecated
public java.util.List<ProjectResource> listAllResources()
        Deprecated. this function was only for testing, should not be used.
        Lists all resources for all projects
        Returns:
        List of ProjectResources

      • listResources

        public java.util.List<ProjectResource> listResources(Project project,
                                                     int root)
        Lists all resources of a project, use root=1 to limit to only root resources (no parent)
        Parameters:
        project - Project to obtain resources for
        root - if root=1 or non-zero, list only resources with no parent; if root=0 or undefined, list all resources
        Returns:
        List of ProjectResources

      • listChildResources

        public java.util.List<ProjectResource> listChildResources(ProjectResource parent)
        Lists ChildResources of a ProjectResource
        Parameters:
        parent - ProjectResource parent
        Returns:
        List of ProjectResources

      • deleteResource

        @LoggedIn
public int deleteResource(ProjectResource resource)
        Deletes a single ProjectResource, and all children resources and associated ResourceAccess. Handles child ProjectResources recursively. Does not lookup permissions for Resource yet
        Parameters:
        resource - ProjectResource to delete
        Returns:
        int status, 200 if successful

      • deleteAllResources

        public int deleteAllResources(Project p)
        Deletes all ProjectResources for a given Project. Gets all root resources, then handles children recursively
        Parameters:
        p - Project
        Returns:
        int status, 200 if successful

        Returns:
